name: Gimmighoul (Chest)
description: The Coin Chest Pokémon. This Pokémon was born inside a treasure chest about 1,500 years ago. It sucks the life-force out of scoundrels who try to steal the treasure.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a damaging Dark, Bug, or Ghost move, it makes its next attack at advantage.

conditions.value: when this Pokémon has collected 999 gimmighoul coins (chest form starts with 50+1d100, roaming form starts with 1d20)
